initialize.title: Initialize Auto Claude
initialize.description: This project doesn't have Auto Claude initialized. Would you like to set it up now?
initialize.createFolder: Create a .auto-claude folder in your project
initialize.copyFramework: Copy the Auto Claude framework files
initialize.setupSpecs: Set up the specs directory for your tasks
initialize.initFailedDescription: Failed to initialize Auto Claude. Please try again.

gitSetup.title: Git Repository Required
gitSetup.description: Auto Claude uses git to safely build features in isolated workspaces
gitSetup.notGitRepo: This folder is not a git repository
gitSetup.needsInit: Git needs to be initialized before Auto Claude can manage your code.
gitSetup.needsCommit: At least one commit is required for Auto Claude to create worktrees.
gitSetup.willSetup: We'll set up git for you:
gitSetup.createCommit: Create an initial commit with your current files
gitSetup.initializingRepo: Initializing git repository and creating initial commit...
gitSetup.readyToUse: Your project is now ready to use with Auto Claude!

worktrees.title: Worktrees
worktrees.description: Manage isolated workspaces for your Auto Claude tasks
worktrees.emptyDescription: Worktrees are created automatically when Auto Claude builds features.
worktrees.mergeDescription: Merge changes from this worktree into the base branch.
worktrees.deleteDescription: This will permanently delete the worktree and all uncommitted changes. This action cannot be undone.
worktrees.bulkDeleteDescription: This will permanently delete the selected worktrees and all their uncommitted changes.

worktreeCleanup.title: Complete Task
worktreeCleanup.hasWorktree: The task "{{taskTitle}}" still has an isolated workspace (worktree).
worktreeCleanup.willDelete: To mark this task as complete, the worktree and its associated branch will be deleted.
worktreeCleanup.warning: Make sure you have merged or saved any changes you want to keep before proceeding.
worktreeCleanup.errorDescription: Failed to cleanup worktree. Please try again.

addFeature.title: Add Feature
addFeature.description: Add a new feature to your roadmap.
addFeature.featureTitlePlaceholder: e.g., User Authentication, Dark Mode Support
addFeature.featureDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe what this feature does and why it's valuable.
addFeature.rationalePlaceholder: Explain why this feature should be built.
addFeature.failedToAdd: Failed to add feature. Please try again.

removeProject.title: Remove Project?
removeProject.description: This will remove "{{projectName}}" from the app. Your files will be preserved on disk and you can re-add the project later.

customModel.title: Custom Model Configuration
customModel.description: Configure the model and thinking level for this session.

confirm.title: Confirm Action
confirm.description: Are you sure you want to proceed?
